name: How to handle your first days of JavaScript
description: A guide to maintaining your sanity and growing your confidence.
body: The first rule is: keep going. Second rule: accept frustration as normal. Third rule: celebrate the little breakthroughs.

name: My first interview is tomorrow. Ack!
description: How to put your best foot forward, even among the nerves and uncertainty.
body: Sleep a lot the night before. Breathe during the interview. Be nice to people.

name: When is it too late to learn coding?
description: We've all heard that sometimes it's too late to turn the car around. When is that?
